
```
geth attach http://localhost:8545
var bin = ''
var abi = [{"type": "constructor", "inputs":[{"name": "totalSupply", "type": "uint256"}], "name": "PreToken", "outputs":[], "payable": true},{"type":"fallback","inputs": [],"outputs": [],"payable": true},{"type":"function","name":"transfer","inputs": [{"name": "_to", "type": "address"},{"name": "_amount", "type": "uint256"}],"outputs": [{"name": "", "type": "bool"}],"payable": true},{"type":"function","name":"balanceOf","inputs": [{"name": "_owner", "type": "address"}],"outputs": [{"name": "", "type": "uint256"}],"payable": true},{"type":"function","name":"contribute","inputs": [],"outputs": [{"name": "", "type": "bool"}],"payable": true},{"type":"function","name":"totalSupply","inputs": [],"outputs": [{"name": "", "type": "uint256"}],"payable": true}]
var Structure = web3.eth.contract(abi)
var contract = Structure.new("10000000", {data: bin, from: web3.eth.coinbase, gas: 4000000})
// init
eth.sendTransaction({to: contract.address, from: web3.eth.coinbase, gas: 4000000})
contract.totalSupply.call({gas: 400000})

contract.startCrowdsale({from: web3.eth.coinbase})
contract.crowdsale.call({gas: 400000})

contract.contribute({from: web3.eth.coinbase, gas: 400000, value: 10000})
```
